original: 吳國將領。曹魏諸葛誕在壽春叛亂時，向孫吳求援，孫吳出兵接應，于詮便在其中。後曹魏攻破壽春，于詮不願降敵，卸甲衝陣，戰死沙場。
text: General Wu Guo. Cao Wei Zhuge Dan asked Sun Wu for help during the Shouchun rebellion, and Sun Wu sent troops to respond, and Yu Quan was among them. After Cao Wei broke Shouchun, Yu Chuan was unwilling to subdue the enemy, so he disarmed and rushed to the battlefield.
